name: HSP_BKT_SURCHARGE
description: Holds information regarding percentages applied to buckets based on the date ranges of the buckets charges.

columns.name: BUCKET_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the bucket record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EFFECTIVE_DT
columns.description: Stores the effective date in the HSD that stored the settings used to calculate the surcharge.

columns.name: AMOUNT
columns.description: This item stores the amount used for the surcharge for a date range.

columns.name: HSP_ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the hospital account on the liability bucket record.

columns.name: SURCHARGABLE_AMT
columns.description: This item stores the amount that the surcharge is applied to on the bucket.

columns.name: SRCHG_CREDIT_AMT
columns.description: This item returns the total amount of surcharge credit transactions posted against a bucket.

columns.name: SRCHG_XFER_IN
columns.description: Stores the total amount of surcharge that has transferred into a liability bucket.

columns.name: SRCHG_XFER_OUT
columns.description: Stores the total amount of surcharge transferred out of a liability bucket.
